title: Cardano Center Poland - web and SM
description: More than 1 out of 10 Polish people heard about cryptocurrencies. How do we enable and encourage them to get to know the Cardano ecosystem?
solution: We are trying to build a Polish Cardano Center where people find valuable data, learn about Cardano's possibilities and exchange their ideas
experience: 4 yrs experienced blockchain translator, podcaster, entrepreneur, editor in top local crypto media outlet with support of 2 SPOs & developer
